post.text: Very proud of our next First Lady Melania Trump! #MakeAmericaSafeAgain

comment.author: Tori
comment.text: What about the plagiarism? That sorry news station msnbc, was quick to point it out. Please crucify the traitor that you have writing your speeches!

replies.author: Tomas
replies.text: Give it up, Tori. Melania plagarized in her speech. I had faith in Trump, but obviously he isn't that bright.
